title: CoI-Based Instructional Design Strategies for Asynchronous Online STEM Education in Large-Scale Settings

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational STEM concepts and online learning experience
context.additional_context: Targeting learners with time constraints (working professionals) but advanced expertise. Digital devices are available, and formative assessments are prioritized for monitoring the learning process.

learning_goals: Learners can apply the three core elements of the CoI framework (social, cognitive, and teaching presence) to asynchronous online STEM education.
Learners can explain how to efficiently analyze online discussion data using Python scripts.
Learners can incorporate discussion design strategies for reducing cognitive load into actual syllabi.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
